title: For P2P platforms
description: Arboreum AI improves risk management of lender portfolios, allowing for the inclusion of riskier borrowers into your network

title: For Employers
description: Arboreum builds and manages company-only credit unions of lenders, borrowers, and supporters, creating a loan benefit for employees

title: For Pro Social Investors
description: Arboreum invests your funds in low income communities; e.g. farmers and cleaners, consisting of borrowers and supporters
